movie.title: Changeling
movie.plot: Christine Collins is overjoyed when her kidnapped son is brought back home. But when Christine suspects that the boy returned to her isn't her child, the police captain has her committed to an asylum.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 51 nominations.

movie.title: State Funeral
movie.plot: The enigma of the personality cult is revealed in the grand spectacle of Stalinâ€™s funeral. The film is based on unique archive footage, shot in the USSR on March 5 - 9, 1953, when the country mourned and buried Joseph Stalin.

movie.title: Black Friday
movie.plot: Bombs tear through Bombay, wreaking havoc and polarising the citizens. With perpetrators at large, the state launches a massive drive to unmask the truth behind these events.

movie.title: Notorious
movie.plot: NOTORIOUS is the story of Christopher Wallace. Through raw talent and sheer determination, Wallace transforms himself from Brooklyn street hustler (once selling crack to pregnant women) to one of the greatest rappers of all time; THE NOTORIOUS B.I.G. Follow his meteoric rise to fame and his refusal to succumb to expectations - redefining our notion of "The American Dream."

movie.title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
movie.plot: The true story of Elle France editor Jean-Dominique Bauby, who, in 1995 at the age of 43, suffered a stroke that paralyzed his entire body, except his left eye. Using that eye to blink out his memoir, Bauby eloquently described the aspects of his interior world, from the psychological torment of being trapped inside his body to his imagined stories from lands he'd only visited in his mind.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 67 wins & 101 nominations.

events.title: Armin Meiwes eats and kills Bernd Brandes

movie.title: Grimm Love
movie.plot: In Germany, as graduate student Katie Armstrong researches cannibal killer Oliver Hagen for her thesis, she becomes obsessed with her subject and ultimately plunges into a lifestyle similar to Hagen's and the thousands of people like him.
